1000101010101111 0010100111111101 1 -> sum: 1011010010101101, cout: 0
1100000110011001 0010001101011111 0 -> sum: 1110010011111000, cout: 0
1000011010010000 0111000011001000 1 -> sum: 1111011101011001, cout: 0
0001100001110011 0111001101110011 1 -> sum: 1000101111100111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
